Package controllers

Class OpenAlbumController

java.lang.Object
controllers.OpenAlbumController
public class OpenAlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
The Open Album Controller. Helps the User modify the photos in the album

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OpenAlbumController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void AddPhoto()
    uses a filechooser to select an image file from the computer and adds that photo to the currently selected album of the currently selected user
    void AddPhotoCaption()
    sets a caption to the caption field of the currently selected photo
    void AddTag()  
    void DeletePhoto()
    Deletes the currently selected photo updates the userlists of changes to this user
    void DeleteTag()
    Deletes the tag as specified in two textfields tagName and tagValue
    void DisplayPhoto()
    displays the currently selected photo
    boolean isDuplicate​(Album a, Photo t)
    Determines if a photo is in an album
    void Logout()
    returns to the login screen
    void MovePhoto()
    Takes the currently selected photo and attempts to move it to the new album who's name is specified in a text field, if the newalbum does not exist or if theres a duplicate the operation will not be done
    void PhotoSlideshow()
    launcher for a photoslideshow of all the pictures in the currently focused albums
    void Refresh()
    refreshes the page populating the listview again
    void start​(java.util.ArrayList<User> userlist, java.lang.String currentusername, java.lang.String albumname)
    Starts controller.
    int tagIndex​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, int index)
    Returns index of tag in current Tag ArrayList
    void ValidTag()
    Adds a valid tag to the list of valid tags of the current photo

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • OpenAlbumController

      public OpenAlbumController()

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(java.util.ArrayList<User> userlist, java.lang.String currentusername, java.lang.String albumname)
      Starts controller. Takes the currently focused upon user and populates a listview with the images and captions from the currently focused upon album
      Parameters:
      userlist - global list of users
      currentusername - name of user that is currently focused on
      albumname - name of album that is currently focused on

    • Refresh

      public void Refresh()
      refreshes the page populating the listview again

    • Logout

      public void Logout()
      returns to the login screen

      java.io.IOException

    • tagIndex

      public int tagIndex​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, int index)
      Returns index of tag in current Tag ArrayList
      Parameters:
      name - : name of the Tag
      value - : value of the Tag
      index - : index of selected Photo
      Returns:
      an integer that tells us the index of the specified Tag in the selected photo's Tag List

    • DisplayPhoto

      public void DisplayPhoto()
      displays the currently selected photo

    • PhotoSlideshow

      public void PhotoSlideshow()
      launcher for a photoslideshow of all the pictures in the currently focused albums

    • MovePhoto

      public void MovePhoto() throws java.io.IOException
      Takes the currently selected photo and attempts to move it to the new album who's name is specified in a text field, if the newalbum does not exist or if theres a duplicate the operation will not be done
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • isDuplicate

      public boolean isDuplicate​(Album a, Photo t)
      Determines if a photo is in an album
      Parameters:
      a - : An Album
      t - : a Photo
      Returns:
      a boolean that tells us if t is in Album a
